Player History
Drafted in 31st round, 496th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Timothy Egerton (ATL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 4/21/2015...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2015, hitting .397 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $3,720,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago on 4/26/2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/13/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Released by Seattle on 9/26/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/7/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
